main.name: Tony Le
main.bio: I'm a dedicated and motivated Software Developer who loves to solve problems. I have 2+ years of designing, implementing, and delivering custom applications and software solutions. I can apply cutting-edge industry skills and knowledge such as Object-Oriented Design, website & app development/administration, and front-end and back-end tools in React environments. I'm an out-of-the-box thinker committed to punctual handover of deliverables while adapting to post-COVID work practices.
main.contactmessage: If my skills and qualifications seem like a good fit, please don't hesitate to contact me! Thank you.

education.description: Algorithms, Data Structures, Computational Worlds, Advanced Software Engineering, Computer Operating Systems, Software Development & QA, Linear Algebra, Calculus 3 & 4, Statistics
Java 1, Java 2, Calculus 1 & 2, Engineering Physics, Microeconomics

work.title: Customer Site Support
work.description: Managed warehouse inventory and utilized POS systems to direct operations. Saved 5 labor hours weekly by developing an automated inventory counting program. Drove continuous process improvements to enhance efficiency and customer satisfaction.

work.title: Collections Associate
work.description: Worked as a full-time collections associate helping T-Mobile users pay off their debts. Consists of a few hundred calls a day, inbound and outbound cold-calls, and keeping track of follow-ups. Required the application of sales techniques, payment plans, discounts, and communicating with credit bereaus such as Equifax, Experian, and TransUnion in order to help relieve debtors from their debt.

work.title: Warehouse Associate
work.description: Required a set pacing of either recieving, scanning, wrapping, or sorting.

work.title: Electronics Sales Associate
work.description: Provide customer service either through phone call, in-person, online orders, selling warrenties, and applying customers for layaway or leases for specific products.
